Name: FLUCTUOID
About the game: Explore a mysterious maze as the enigmatic FLUCTUOID, a lifeform that can change size. Use your ability to shrink and grow at will to explore 9 different themed worlds, solving puzzles to explore further into the strange place. Gameplay Features Change size with the press of a button. When you're big you're heavy and slow but when you're small you're light and speedy Slip through cracks in the maze by shrinking as you jump towards them Grow big to sink deep into watery pools and explore hidden areas Find a safe path between dangerous obstacles as time slows down the smaller you get Let the sounds relax you on your journey FLUCTUOID starts easy but gets progressively more difficult Don't let the challenge get to you, just take a breath and enjoy the soothing music Try to collect all the mysterious cubes and change the ending you get
